title: New Message Screen Dark And Filled With Coding
creator: mike38
content: When I turned on my PC this morning there was a new message that popped-up that I never sent which was very difficult to cancel/close/discard so I rebooted my laptop. When I went back into Thunderbird to create a new message, the entire screen was dark and filled with coding (see screen shot below.) If I click on each element I can delete them and get back to a blank page. Also, it appears, thankfully, I am sending and receiving emails as normal. My email domain is with Go Daddy and I do use Owl so don't know if that has any effect. I would appreciate any help. Thank You!

title: Images not appearing in Thunderbird
creator: KJS-LES
content:
I'm currently noticing that images sent to me aren't appearing in Thunderbird Inbox.

I look at messages first in Mailwasher (while they're still on the server) and download the ones I want to keep or read later. I saw an image in one of today's emails while it was in Mailwasher, but when I read it in Thunderbird, the image wasn't there.

Then I noticed a couple of other emails that mention an attachment, there is nothing there.

Previously received photos are still there.

Is there some setting I accidentally made?

Thanks, Kami
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:139.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/139.0
